snippet: How often have certain words or phrases appeared in books over time? A web tool offers answers, and insights into human history.
abstract: Natasha Singer Technophoria column; Google tool, the Ngram Viewer, allows anyone to chart the use of words and phrases in millions of books back to year 1500; by measuring historical shifts in language, the tool offers quantitative approach to understanding human history.
lead_paragraph: How often have certain words or phrases appeared in books over time? A web tool offers answers, and insights into human history.

headline.main: In a Scoreboard of Words, a Cultural Guide
headline.print_headline: In a Scoreboard of Words, a Cultural Guide
